title: PBE SIGNUPS

embed.description: We're opening up PBE signups to ensure plenty of testing for features hitting PBE on November 3. Positive players get first dibs on accounts, so sign up today! PBE can take a Zilean minutes to patch up, so if you make the cut start your download ahead of November 3.

body: Why on PBE signups are temporarily closed. I can't create account on PBE. When this server will work

replies.body: The page used for [**pbe signups**](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe) are in fact closed until further notice. We don't currently have a date for when they'll open back up, but we're working on making the process a lot smoother for players in the future.
